name: Mapping Solutions Worldwide, Inc.
description: Mapping Solutions Worldwide, Inc. (MAPSW) is a leading provider of geographic information systems (GIS) and mapping technologies, specializing in innovative solutions for various industries including urban planning, transportation, environmental management, and telecommunications. Founded in 2010, the company has rapidly grown to become a key player in the GIS sector by leveraging advanced technologies such as artificial intelligence and machine learning to enhance its mapping capabilities. MAPSW's flagship product, the GeoMap Pro, offers real-time data visualization and analytics, helping organizations make informed decisions based on geographic data. The company's commitment to sustainability is reflected in its initiatives to support environmental conservation through precision mapping and data-driven insights. In addition to its software solutions, MAPSW provides consulting services, training programs, and technical support to ensure clients maximize the benefits of their mapping technologies. With a focus on innovation and customer satisfaction, Mapping Solutions Worldwide is dedicated to shaping the future of geographic information services.

faq.answer: Mapping Solutions Worldwide is headquartered in San Francisco, California, USA.

faq.answer: The main products include GeoMap Pro and Map Analytics Suite, along with various consulting and training services.

faq.answer: Mapping Solutions Worldwide was founded in 2010.
